definition: (main) hall/large room for a specific purpose/CL:間|间[jian1]/relationship between cousins etc on the paternal side of a family/of the same clan/classifier for classes, lectures etc/classifier for sets of furniture

pinyin: Wei1 si1 min3 si1 te4 Jiao4 tang2

definition: Hagia Sophia (the main cathedral of Constantinople, subsequently the major mosque of Istanbul)
pinyin: Sheng4 Suo3 fei1 ya4 da4 jiao4 tang2

sentences.english: The Hendersons seldom go to church, but they believe.
sentences.chinese: 亨德森一家很少去教堂做礼拜，但他们笃信宗教。
克里姆林宫的圣母领报大教堂。

sentences.english: Christians believe Jesus Christ was buried where the Church of the Holy Sepulchre now stands in Jerusalem.
sentences.chinese: 基督徒们相信耶稣基督就是被葬在了这座圣墓教堂下。

sentences.english: Inarius took the guise of a human as The Prophet of the Cathedral of Light.
sentences.chinese: 印那瑞斯本人伪装成一个人类，作为光之大教堂先知。

sentences.english: The sexton therefore took him into his house, and he had to ring the church bell.
sentences.chinese: 于是司事就将老二带走了，让他在教堂敲钟。

sentences.english: She is very religious and goes to church three times a week.
sentences.chinese: 她非常虔诚，每周去教堂三次。

sentences.english: His grandfather lies in the churchyard.
sentences.chinese: 他祖父葬于教堂的墓地。

sentences.english: The old church collapsed after the heavy rain.
sentences.chinese: 大雨之后，那座老教堂倒塌了。

sentences.english: The hugest one is Christ Resurrection Cathedral.
sentences.chinese: 其中最大的是基督复活教堂。

sentences.english: There was an infant squalling in the back of the church.
sentences.chinese: 有个婴儿在教堂后部大声啼哭。

sentences.english: Churches are now too often destructive battlegrounds of an ideological right and left.
sentences.chinese: 而今教堂往往成为意识形态左右派相斗的消极战场。

sentences.english: The church's east window has beautifully coloured glass.
sentences.chinese: 教堂朝东的窗子是用精美的彩色玻璃镶嵌成的。

sentences.english: The interior of the church was dark.
sentences.chinese: 这家教堂的内部漆黑一片。

sentences.english: Critics argue this stunt is hostile to the Catholic Church.
sentences.chinese: 批语家指出这样的惊人表演是对天主教堂的不敬重。

sentences.english: "Look what they have done to our church, " says Shahida William, the wife of the pastor, pointing at the deeply blackened one-room Faith Bible Church.
sentences.chinese: 看看他都对我们的教堂做了什么。

sentences.english: The wooden churches were transported here and reconstructed.
sentences.chinese: 这座木构教堂是被搬运到这儿并重建的。

definition: to go to church on Sunday (of Christians)
